Package ss.week2.hotel

Class Guest

java.lang.Object
ss.week2.hotel.Guest
public class Guest extends Object
Hotel guest with a name and possibly a hotel room.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of this Guest.

    • getRoom

      public ss.week2.hotel.Room getRoom()
      Returns the Room that is rented by this Guest.
      Returns:
      Room rented by this Guest; null if this Guest does not rent a room

    • checkin

      public boolean checkin​(ss.week2.hotel.Room room)
      Rents a Room to this Guest. This is only possible if this Guest does not already have a Room. and the Room to be assigned is not already rented. Also adapts the Guest-reference of the Room.
      Parameters:
      room - Room to be rented to this Guest;
      Returns:
      true if checkin succeeded; false if this Guest already had a Room, or room already had a Guest.

    • checkout

      public boolean checkout()
      Sets the Room of this Guest to null. Also resets the Guest-reference of the (current) Room.
      Returns:
      true if this action succeeded; false if Guest does not have a Room when this method is called

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
